com.saltedge.connector.sdk.provider

Interface ProviderApi


  • public interface ProviderApi
    Interface for communication between Compliance Connector and Service Provider application. Service Provider application should implement `@Service` which `implements ProviderApi`

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String authorizeUser(java.lang.String authTypeCode, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> credentials)
      Authenticates user by provided credentials.
      void cancelPayment(java.lang.String paymentId)
      Cancel the Payment that is in the process of creation, meaning it has not been confirmed yet.
      boolean confirmPayment(java.lang.String paymentId, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> credentials)
      Checks provided confirmation credentials and confirms payment if they are valid.

      • getExchangeRates

        java.util.List<ExchangeRate> getExchangeRates()
        Provides current currencies exchange rates
        Returns:
        list of ExchangeRate objects
        See Also:
        ExchangeRate

      • getAuthorizationTypes

        java.util.List<AuthorizationType> getAuthorizationTypes()
        Provides Authorization Types registered in `Dashboard/Settings/Authorization types` for Customer. (https://priora.saltedge.com/providers/settings#authorization_types)
        Returns:
        list of AuthorizationType objects
        See Also:
        AuthorizationType

      • getAuthorizationTypeByCode

        AuthorizationType getAuthorizationTypeByCode(java.lang.String authTypeCode)
        Provides one of Authorization Types registered in `Dashboard/Settings/Authorization types` for Customer. (https://priora.saltedge.com/providers/settings#authorization_types) Authorization Type is selected by type code (e.g. `oauth`)
        Parameters:
        authTypeCode - of Authorization Type (e.g. `oauth`)
        Returns:
        AuthorizationType registered AuthorizationType
        See Also:
        AuthorizationType

      • getAuthorizationPageUrl

        java.lang.String getAuthorizationPageUrl()
        Provides url of provider's authorization page designated for oAuth authorization
        Returns:
        URL string of Authorization page

      • createAndSendAuthorizationConfirmationCode

        java.lang.String createAndSendAuthorizationConfirmationCode(java.lang.String userId,
                                                            AuthorizationType authType)
        Generates confirmation code for authorization interactive step and send it to customer via designated communication channel (e.g. sms)
        Parameters:
        userId - User identifier on Provider side
        authType - registered AuthorizationType
        Returns:
        confirmation code string

      • authorizeUser

        java.lang.String authorizeUser(java.lang.String authTypeCode,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> credentials)
        Authenticates user by provided credentials. Credentials values should be extracted from `credentials` map by schema from AuthorizationType by `authTypeCode`
        Parameters:
        authTypeCode - code of registered Authorization Type (e.g. `oauth`)
        credentials - map of required first step credentials.
        Returns:
        User identifier on Provider side

      • getReconnectPolicyType

        ReconnectPolicyType getReconnectPolicyType(java.lang.String userId)
        Provides reconnect policy type for an user. Connector supports next reconnect policy types: GRANT, MFA, DENY. If provided GRANT type then customer will be reconnected right on request. If provided MFA type then customer will be redirected to confirmation step. If provided DENY type then customer request will be revoked.
        Parameters:
        userId - User identifier on Provider side
        Returns:
        ReconnectPolicyType
        See Also:
        ReconnectPolicyType

      • getKyc

        KycData getKyc(java.lang.String userId)
        Provides personal data of user.
        Parameters:
        userId - User identifier on Provider side
        Returns:
        KycData
        See Also:
        KycData

      • getAccounts

        java.util.List<AccountData> getAccounts(java.lang.String userId)
        Provides account information of user
        Parameters:
        userId - User identifier on Provider side
        Returns:
        list of AccountData objects
        See Also:
        AccountData

      • getTransactions

        java.util.List<TransactionData> getTransactions(java.lang.String userId,
                                                java.lang.Long accountId,
                                                java.util.Date fromDate,
                                                java.util.Date toDate)
        Provides transactions which belong to account of user
        Parameters:
        userId - User identifier on Provider side
        accountId - Account identifier on Provider side
        fromDate - Specifies the starting date, from which transactions should be fetched. This value can be set to 90 days ago by default.
        toDate - Specifies the ending date, to which transactions should be fetched. This value will always be the todayâ€™s date.
        Returns:
        list of TransactionData objects
        See Also:
        TransactionData

      • getPaymentTemplates

        java.util.List<PaymentTemplate> getPaymentTemplates(java.lang.String userId)
        Provides Payment Templates registered in `Dashboard/Payment Templates` for Customer. (https://priora.saltedge.com/providers/templates)
        Parameters:
        userId - User identifier on Provider side
        Returns:
        list of PaymentTemplate objects
        See Also:
        PaymentTemplate

      • getPaymentTemplateByCode

        PaymentTemplate getPaymentTemplateByCode(java.lang.String userId,
                                         java.lang.String templateCode)
        Provides one of Payment Templates registered in `Dashboard/Payment Templates` for Customer. (https://priora.saltedge.com/providers/templates) Payment Template is selected by template code (e.g. `swift`, `sepa`)
        Parameters:
        userId - User identifier on Provider side
        templateCode - code of registered Payment Template (e.g. `swift`)
        Returns:
        PaymentTemplate
        See Also:
        PaymentTemplate

      • createPayment

        java.lang.String createPayment(java.lang.String userId,
                               PaymentTemplate paymentTemplate,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> paymentAttributes,
                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> extra)
        Initiates a Payment for User
        Parameters:
        userId - User identifier on Provider side
        paymentTemplate - registered Payment Template
        paymentAttributes - all attributes(required and optional) that are needed for a successful payment initiation according to specified payment template.
        extra - any additional information deemed relevant to a payment, also service information like `priora_payment_id`. Extra should be saved and returned unmodified at `getPaymentData` request
        Returns:
        Payment identifier on Provider side
        See Also:
        PaymentTemplate

      • isPaymentConfirmed

        boolean isPaymentConfirmed(java.lang.String paymentId)
        Checks if Payment is confirmed/done or not.
        Parameters:
        paymentId - Payment identifier on Provider side
        Returns:
        true if Payment is confirmed

      • getPaymentConfirmationPageUrl

        java.lang.String getPaymentConfirmationPageUrl(java.lang.String paymentId)
        Provides url of provider's confirmation page designated for oAuth payment confirmation
        Parameters:
        paymentId - Payment identifier on Provider side
        Returns:
        URL string of Payment confirmation page

      • hasPayment

        boolean hasPayment(java.lang.String paymentId)
        Checks if Payment is saved in Provider's database
        Parameters:
        paymentId - Payment identifier on Provider side
        Returns:
        true if Payment exist

        PaymentData getPaymentData(java.lang.String paymentId)
        Provides Payment data including fees, status and other.
        Parameters:
        paymentId - Payment identifier on Provider side
        Returns:
        PaymentData
        See Also:
        PaymentData

      • confirmPayment

        boolean confirmPayment(java.lang.String paymentId,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> credentials)
        Checks provided confirmation credentials and confirms payment if they are valid.
        Parameters:
        paymentId - Payment identifier on Provider side
        credentials - map for required MFA credentials
        Returns:
        true if Payment was confirmed

      • cancelPayment

        void cancelPayment(java.lang.String paymentId)
        Cancel the Payment that is in the process of creation, meaning it has not been confirmed yet.
        Parameters:
        paymentId - Payment identifier on Provider side
